src:
Parižani iritirani Zidanovim komentarima u vezi sa Mbapeom
07 Nov 2019, 11:19 by Nemanja
Sportski direktor Pari Sen Žermena Leonardo kritikovao je komentare trenera Real Madrida Zinedina Zidana u vezi sa Kilijanom Mbapeom.
Zidan je rekao da je Mbapeov san da zaigra za Real Madrid, na šta je Leonardo rekao da je već postalo dosadno.
 – Iskreno, iritirajuće je. Dosadno je. Nije prvi put da se ovo dešava. Kilijan je veoma važan za nas. Sada nije vreme da ga destabilizujemo – rekao je Leonardo.
Francuski tim se kvalifikovao u nokaut fazu Lige šampiona pobedom nad Klub Brižom, a naredni meč igraće upravo sa Real Madridom 26. novembra.
 – Mbape je igrač koji ima još dve i po godine ugovora sa nama, tako da, pričati o onome šta on želi, šta su njegovi snovi, svaki put…Možemo li samo prestati sa ovim – kazao je Leonardo.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Parisians irritated by Zidane's comments regarding Mbape
07 Nov 2019, 11:19 by Nemanja
Paris Saint-Germain sports director Leonardo has criticized Real Madrid coach Zinedine Zidan's comments regarding Kilian Mbape.
Zidan said Mbape's dream was to play for Real Madrid, to which Leonardo said he had already become bored.
- Honestly, it's irritating. Its boring. This is not the first time this is happening. Kilian is very important to us. Now is not the time to destabilize it, ”Leonardo said.
The French team qualified for the knockout phase of the Champions League with a victory over Club Brugge, and the next match will be played with Real Madrid on November 26th.
- Mbape is a player who has another two and a half years contract with us, so, to talk about what he wants, what his dreams are, every time ... Can we just stop this - Leonardo said.
